series.name: Finding Your Identity in Christ
series.description: A 7-day journey to discover who you truly are in Christ. This series explores the foundational truths of your identity as a child of God, helping you break free from worldly labels and embrace your eternal purpose.
series.short_description: Discover who you truly are in Christ through 7 transformative devotionals.
series.author: EUONGELION Team

series.name: The Power of Daily Prayer
series.description: Learn to develop a consistent and powerful prayer life over 14 days. From the basics of conversation with God to intercession and spiritual warfare, this series will transform your relationship with the Father.
series.short_description: Transform your prayer life with practical guidance and spiritual insights.
series.author: EUONGELION Team

series.name: Walking Through Trials
series.description: When life gets hard, where do you turn? This 10-day series helps you navigate difficult seasons with faith, hope, and the promises of Scripture. Learn to find God's presence and purpose in your pain.
series.short_description: Find hope and strength when walking through life's most difficult seasons.
series.author: EUONGELION Team

series.name: Foundations of Faith
series.description: Perfect for new believers or those wanting to revisit the basics. This 21-day journey covers the essential doctrines of Christianity, from salvation to sanctification, building a solid foundation for lifelong faith.
series.short_description: Build a solid foundation for lifelong faith with essential Christian doctrines.
series.author: EUONGELION Team

series.name: The Nature of Belief
series.description: A 6-day deep dive into James 1:2-8, exploring how to maintain consistent faith when facing difficult circumstances. Learn what it means to ask for wisdom without doubting and overcome double-mindedness.
series.short_description: Understand faith under pressure and overcome doubt through James' wisdom.
series.author: EUONGELION Team

series.name: What Is the Gospel?
series.description: Dive deep into the heart of Christianity: the Gospel message. This series unpacks what the good news really means, why it matters, and how it transforms every aspect of your life.
series.short_description: Understand the transformative power of the Gospel message.
series.author: EUONGELION Team

series.name: Hearing God in the Noise
series.description: In a world of constant distraction, how do we hear God's voice? This series explores the disciplines and practices that help us tune our hearts to hear the Spirit, discern His leading, and respond in obedience.
series.short_description: Learn to discern God's voice amid life's distractions.
series.author: EUONGELION Team

series.name: The Lord Is My Shepherd
series.description: A verse-by-verse journey through Psalm 23, one of the most beloved passages in Scripture. Discover the depths of God's provision, protection, and presence as your Shepherd.
series.short_description: Experience the depths of Psalm 23 and God's shepherding love.
series.author: EUONGELION Team

series.name: Too Busy for God
series.description: Our schedules are full, but our souls are empty. This series challenges the idol of busyness and shows how to create rhythms of rest, reflection, and relationship with God in our hurried world.
series.short_description: Break free from busyness and create space for God.
series.author: EUONGELION Team

series.name: What Is Carrying a Cross?
series.description: Jesus calls us to take up our cross and follow Him, but what does that really mean? This series explores the cost of discipleship, the meaning of self-denial, and the joy found in surrendering to Christ.
series.short_description: Understand the true meaning of cross-bearing discipleship.
series.author: EUONGELION Team
